            cryptocurrency trading] in the block "Why trade cryptocurrencies with Capital.com?" on the page

        License: SCA
        Author: Kasila

    def test_270(self, worker_id, d, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password):
        """

        )
